title: SRO Available 7547 N. Ridge Chicago, Ill 60645
posting_body: SRO single room available at 7547 N. Ridge shared kitchen, bathroom and common area.
Right in the very area of Rodgers Park.
15 minute walk to Rodgers Park Beach!

This location has easy accessibility to downtown by way of multiple public transportation options, the easy accessibility means that the unique dining, arts, culture and entertainment that are found in Rogers Park are never too far away from its residents and travelers.
The sound of waves crashing along the shores is near as well, almost all the streets will lead you east end to public beaches and parkland on Lake Michigan.
Rodgers Park is also known for its distinct diversity.
This property is part of a desirable area that has much to offer!
Application processing fee required, credit score of at least 640, income must be at least 2-12 times the rent.
